text: 12:6 Dɨboboniba 32:33; Godɨn Araziba 3:12Ezɨ Moses, a Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ingangarir gumazim, a Israelia ko, Sihon ko Ok mɨsogha bar aning abɨra. Egha Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ingangarir gumazim Moses, nguazir kam isa Rubenɨn anabamɨn adarazi ko, Gatɨn anabamɨn adarasi, ko Manasen anabar me tuirazimningɨn mam a me ganɨngi.
